category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MEAssignmentsViewColumnsShownWidthPref
preference.preference_description: Specifies the width of the columns displayed in the Assignments view. This setting affects each column defined in the MEAssignmentsViewColumnsShownPref preference. Valid Values: Integers that define the number of characters permitted in each column. There should be one value for each column defined in the MEAssignmentsViewColumnsShownPref preference, and the values are applied in the same order (that is, the first value in this preference is applied to the first column in the MEAssignmentsViewColumnsShownPref and so on).
